name: ChromaBot
description:
What if you were just a little robot.

A little bot with a smile plastered on your face and sunglasses coded onto your screen. Your butt is always repelling the ground so you can freely move through the Y axis.

This dude is rad as hell, right?

 Well yes and no.

The little robot is all alone in a space station and it has to try to get out in order to find company but it can't do that alone.

Match the robot's screen color with the wheels and get it off it's metal prison.

Music and sound fxs by:

GWriterStudio - 8-bit Music

Dustyroom - Casual Game Sounds

Theo Prior Music - Sci-Fi Music

xDeviruchi - 8-bit Adventure & Fantasy Music

Thanks to everyone of these people for putting their work online for free!

You're all awesome!
